page.title: 14SPORT IN IBSTOCK
page.content: Many sporting opportunities are available in Ibstock. Most of the indoor ones are to be found at the Community College and they include basket-ball, badminton, judo, swimming and canoeing. These facilities are shared by a very active club for the disabled. The Miners' Welfare runs a thriving bowls club and also cricket and football teams. The Welfare cricket ground is situated behind the club building in Leicester Road and the Ibstock Town C.C. ground is just off Melbourne Road. The Welfare Club has two teams in the local District League and Ibstock Penistone Rovers' F.C. is in the Derby League. For youngsters, the village has an under 16's team, an under 12's team and an under 11's team.
